title: PM offers Friday prayer at Urumqi’s historic Grand Bazar Mosque
content:
URUMQI, Oct 20 (APP): Caretaker Prime Minister Anwaar-ul-Haq Kakar offered Friday prayer at the historic Hang Yang Grand Bazar Mosque of Urumqi.
The prime minister prayed for the progress and prosperity of country as well as the Muslim Ummah.
He specially prayed for the oppressed people of Gaza and for their deliverance from the sufferings.
آج جمعہ کی نماز چین کے صوبہ شنجیانگ کے شہر اُرمچی میں تاریخی مسجد میں ادا کرنے کا موقع ملا۔ pic.twitter.com/QryjZYnKAw
— Anwaar ul Haq Kakar (@anwaar_kakar) October 20, 2023
He was accompanied by his delegation member including Jalil Abbas Jilani, Sarfaraz Bugti and others.
The prime minister also interacted with Abdureqip Tumulniyaz, Imam of Hang Yang Mosque and Dean of Xinjiang Islamic Institute.
